Notes.Text:
This update for glibc fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-2961: iconv: ISO-2022-CN-EXT: fix out-of-bound writes when writing escape sequence (bsc#1222992)

Vulnerabilities.Description: The iconv() function in the GNU C Library versions 2.39 and older may overflow the output buffer passed to it by up to 4 bytes when converting strings to the ISO-2022-CN-EXT character set, which may be used to crash an application or overwrite a neighbouring variable.
